In re_viewer::external::arrow2::compute::filter

?

Function re_viewer::external::arrow2::compute::filter::build_filter

pub fn build_filter(
    filter: &BooleanArray
) -> Result<Box<dyn Fn(&(dyn Array + 'static)) -> Box<dyn Array> + Send + Sync + '_>, Error>
Expand description

Returns a prepared function optimized to filter multiple arrays. Creating this function requires time, but using it is faster than filter when the same filter needs to be applied to multiple arrays (e.g. a multiple columns).
